name: GetBoneChainLength

arguments.name: begname
arguments.desc: Name of the start-bone of the chain

arguments.name: endname
arguments.desc: Name of the end-bone of the chain

returns.name: length
returns.desc: Length of the bone chain between "start-bone" and "end-bone"

description: This will calculate the length of the bone-chain between the endpoints.
If the skeleton have a chain like this (shoulder_l -> upper_arm_l -> lower_arm_l -> hand_l) it will return the length of the upper_arm_l+lower_arm_l
